casebody.data:
In re COCCARO et al. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. October 31, 1922.) No. 75. Alexander & Green, of New York City (Clifton P. Williamson,* of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Leo Qppenheimer, of New York City, for appellee Lesser. Frank, Weil & Strouse, of New York (Sty (Samuel F. Frank and Samuel H. Kaufman, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee Chrystie.

Before ROGERS, MANTON, and MAYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
